content:
This is pretty brutal in Reverse, but at least having 11 tests makes it somewhat solvable.

7 minutes was the fastest anyone could figure it out in my clash, not sure if Reverse is appropriate, but it's passable.
https://www.codingame.com/clashofcode/clash/report/42095370d854b1decadbe0b527e11a53ca005ff

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This is very cool and epic

Not too difficult, and I like how the problem relates to the greedy algorithm. Very fun problem.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: it is fantastic!
